description:
Their men's Brion Pant II is an upgraded version of a long-time fan fave. Made with ReZion™, the Earth-friendly evolution of their bestselling performance fabric, you can adventure confidently knowing there's over two decades of tried and trusted durability backing you up.

How exactly did they upgrade it? They reinforced the back pocket with a double needle topstitch and added additional reinforcement to the mobility gusset. The end result? A style that's tough enough for whatever you throw at it, but with a casual style perfect for everyday wear as well.
name: Prana Brion Pants II, 30" Inseam - Mens
